title: Towards high-speed optical quantum memories
title_cn: 走向高速光量子存储器
abstract: Quantum memories, capable of controllably storing and releasing a photon, are a crucial component for quantum computers and quantum communications. To date, quantum memories have operated with bandwidths that limit data rates to megahertz. Here we report the coherent storage and retrieval of sub-nanosecond low-intensity light pulses with spectral bandwidths exceeding 1 GHz in caesium vapour. The novel memory interaction takes place through a far off-resonant two-photon transition in which the memory bandwidth is dynamically generated by a strong control field. This should allow data rates more than 100 times greater than those of existing quantum memories. The memory works with a total efficiency of 15%, and its coherence is demonstrated through direct interference of the stored and retrieved pulses. Coherence times in hot atomic vapours are on the order of microseconds, the expected storage time limit for this memory.
abstract_cn: 能够可控地存储和释放光子的量子存储器是量子计算机和量子通信的重要组成部分。 迄今为止，量子存储器的带宽已将数据速率限制为兆赫兹。 在这里，我们报告了铯蒸气中光谱带宽超过1＆＃160GHz的亚纳秒低强度光脉冲的相干存储和检索。 新颖的内存交互是通过相差很远的双光子跃迁发生的，其中，一个强大的控制场会动态生成内存带宽。 这应该使数据速率比现有量子存储器的数据速率高100倍以上。 该存储器的总效率为15％，并且通过存储和检索脉冲的直接干扰来证明其一致性。 在热原子蒸气中的相干时间约为微秒，这是该内存的预期存储时间限制。

title: Light extraction from organic light-emitting diodes enhanced by spontaneously formed buckles
title_cn: 自发形成的带扣增强了有机发光二极管的光提取
abstract: Most of the light in conventional organic light-emitting diodes is confined to high-refractive-index layers (such as an organic medium, indium tin oxide and glass substrate) resulting in a low light extraction efficiency of ∼20% (refs 1,2). Many studies have used wavelength-scale periodic gratings to increase the external efficiency of organic light-emitting diodes. However, the efficiency is only enhanced at particular wavelengths satisfying the Bragg condition. Here, we demonstrate that a quasi-periodic buckling structure with broad distribution and directional randomness can enhance the light extraction efficiency without introducing spectral changes and directionality. Organic light-emitting diodes corrugated by buckles showed improved current and power efficiencies and an electroluminescence spectrum enhanced by at least a factor of two across the entire visible wavelength regime. These buckling patterns are formed spontaneously on elastic materials with a thin metallic film. The buckled organic light-emitting diode devices are practical and attractive for use in fabricating full colour and white organic light-emitting diodes.
abstract_cn: 常规有机发光二极管中的大多数光都局限于高折射率层（例如有机介质，氧化铟锡和玻璃基板），导致光提取效率低至20 ％（参考1,2）。许多研究已经使用了波长尺度的周期性光栅来提高有机发光二极管的外部效率。但是，只有在满足布拉格条件的特定波长下，效率才会提高。在这里，我们证明具有宽分布和方向随机性的准周期屈曲结构可以提高光提取效率，而不会引入光谱变化和方向性。波纹状的有机发光二极管显示出改善的电流和功率效率，并且在整个可见波长范围内，电致发光光谱增强了至少两倍。这些屈曲图案是在具有薄金属膜的弹性材料上自发形成的。带扣有机发光二极管器件实用且具有吸引力，可用于制造全色和白色有机发光二极管。

title: Experimental realization of sub-shot-noise quantum imaging
title_cn: 次散粒量子成像的实验实现
abstract: The properties of quantum states have led to the development of new technologies, ranging from quantum information to quantum metrology. A recent field of research to emerge is quantum imaging, which aims to overcome the limits of classical imaging by making use of the spatial properties of quantum states of light . In particular, quantum correlations between twin beams represent a fundamental resource for these studies. One of the most interesting proposed schemes takes advantage of the spatial quantum correlations between parametric down-conversion light beams to realize sub-shot-noise imaging of weak absorbing objects, leading ideally to noise-free imaging. Here, we present the first experimental realization of this scheme, showing its potential to achieve a larger signal-to-noise ratio than classical imaging methods. This work represents the starting point for this quantum technology, which we anticipate will have applications when there is a requirement for low-photon-flux illumination (for example for use with biological samples).
abstract_cn: 量子态的性质导致了从量子信息到量子计量学的新技术的发展。量子成像是最近出现的研究领域，其目的是通过利用光的量子态的空间特性来克服经典成像的局限性。特别地，双束之间的量子相关性代表了这些研究的基本资源。提出的最有趣的方案之一是利用参数下转换光束之间的空间量子相关性来实现弱吸收对象的子散粒噪声成像，从而理想地实现无噪声成像。在这里，我们介绍了该方案的第一个实验实现，显示了其实现比传统成像方法更大的信噪比的潜力。这项工作代表了这种量子技术的起点，我们预计它将在需要低光子通量照明（例如用于生物样品）的情况下应用。

title: Random distributed feedback fibre laser
title_cn: 随机分布反馈光纤激光器
abstract: The concept of random lasers making use of multiple scattering in amplifying disordered media to generate coherent light has attracted a great deal of attention in recent years. Here, we demonstrate a fibre laser with a mirrorless open cavity that operates via Rayleigh scattering, amplified through the Raman effect. The fibre waveguide geometry provides transverse confinement and effectively one-dimensional random distributed feedback, leading to the generation of a stationary near-Gaussian beam with a narrow spectrum, and with efficiency and performance comparable to regular lasers. Rayleigh scattering due to inhomogeneities within the glass structure of the fibre is extremely weak, making the operation and properties of the proposed random distributed feedback lasers profoundly different from those of both traditional random lasers and conventional fibre lasers.
abstract_cn: 近年来，在放大无序介质中利用多重散射产生相干光的随机激光器概念引起了广泛的关注。 在这里，我们演示了具有无镜开放腔的光纤激光器，该激光器通过瑞利散射运行，并通过拉曼效应放大。 光纤波导的几何形状提供了横向限制和有效的一维随机分布反馈，从而产生了具有窄光谱的稳定近高斯光束，并且其效率和性能可与常规激光器媲美。 光纤玻璃结构中的不均匀性导致的瑞利散射极弱，这使得所提出的随机分布反馈激光器的操作和性能与传统的随机激光器和传统的光纤激光器都大为不同。

title: Coherent mixing of mechanical excitations in nano-optomechanical structures
title_cn: 纳米光机械结构中机械激发的相干混合
abstract: The combination of the large per-photon optical force and small motional mass achievable in nanocavity optomechanical systems results in strong dynamical back-action between mechanical motion and the cavity light field. In this Article, we study the optical control of mechanical motion within two different nanocavity structures, a zipper nanobeam photonic crystal cavity and a double-microdisk whispering-gallery resonator. The strong optical gradient force within these cavities is shown to introduce significant optical rigidity into the structure, with the dressed mechanical states renormalized into optically bright and optically dark modes of motion. With the addition of internal mechanical coupling between mechanical modes, a form of optically controlled mechanical transparency is demonstrated in analogy to electromagnetically induced transparency of three-level atomic media. Based upon these measurements, a proposal for coherently transferring radio-frequency/microwave signals between the optical field and a long-lived dark mechanical state is described.
abstract_cn: 在纳米腔光学机械系统中可以实现的大的单光子光学力和小的运动质量的结合，导致机械运动与腔体光场之间产生强烈的动态反作用。在本文中，我们研究了在两个不同的纳米腔结构，一个拉链纳米束光子晶体腔和一个双微盘耳语画廊共振器中机械运动的光学控制。这些腔内的强光学梯度力显示出可将显着的光学刚度引入结构，同时将修整后的机械状态重新归一化为光学上明亮和光学上黑暗的运动模式。通过在机械模式之间增加内部机械耦合，类似于电磁感应的三级原子介质的透明性，展示了一种光学控制的机械透明性形式。基于这些测量，提出了一种在光场与长寿命暗机械状态之间相干传输射频/微波信号的建议。

title: Quantum-optical state engineering up to the two-photon level
title_cn: 高达两光子级的量子光学状态工程
abstract: The ability to prepare arbitrary quantum states within a certain Hilbert space is the holy grail of quantum information technology. It is particularly important for light, as this is the only physical system that can communicate quantum information over long distances. We propose and experimentally verify a scheme to produce arbitrary single-mode states of a travelling light field up to the two-photon level. The desired state is remotely prepared in the signal channel of spontaneous parametric down-conversion by means of conditional measurements on the idler channel. The measurement consists of bringing the idler field into interference with two ancilla coherent states, followed by two single-photon detectors, which, in coincidence, herald the preparation event. By varying the amplitudes and phases of the ancillae, we can prepare any arbitrary superposition of zero-, one- and two-photon states.
abstract_cn: 在特定的希尔伯特空间内准备任意量子态的能力是量子信息技术的圣杯。 对于光而言，这尤其重要，因为这是唯一可以长距离传输量子信息的物理系统。 我们提出并通过实验验证了一种方案，该方案可产生高达两光子级的行进光场的任意单模态。 通过对空闲通道的条件测量，可以在自发参数下变频的信号通道中远程准备所需状态。 测量包括使惰轮场受到两个辅助相干态的干扰，然后是两个单光子探测器，这恰好预示着准备事件。 通过改变辅助波的振幅和相位，我们可以准备零，一和两光子状态的任意叠加。

title: Real-time full-field arbitrary optical waveform measurement
title_cn: 实时全场任意光波形测量
abstract: The development of a real-time optical waveform measurement technique with quantum-limited sensitivity, unlimited record lengths and an instantaneous bandwidth scalable to terahertz frequencies would be beneficial in the investigation of many ultrafast optical phenomena. Currently, full-field (amplitude and phase) optical measurements with a bandwidth greater than 100 GHz require repetitive signals to facilitate equivalent-time sampling methods or are single-shot in nature with limited time records. Here, we demonstrate a bandwidth- and time-record scalable measurement that performs parallel coherent detection on spectral slices of arbitrary optical waveforms in the 1.55 µm telecommunications band. External balanced photodetection and high-speed digitizers record the in-phase and quadrature-phase components of each demodulated spectral slice, and digital signal processing reconstructs the signal waveform. The approach is passive, extendable to other regions of the optical spectrum, and can be implemented as a single silicon photonic integrated circuit.
abstract_cn: 实时光学波形测量技术的发展具有量子限制的灵敏度，无限的记录长度和可扩展至太赫兹频率的瞬时带宽，将有助于研究许多超快光学现象。当前，带宽大于100＆＃160; GHz的全场（幅度和相位）光学测量需要重复信号以促进等效时间采样方法，或者本质上是单发的，具有有限的时间记录。在这里，我们演示了一个带宽和时间记录可伸缩的测量，该测量对1.55微米电信频段中任意光波形的频谱切片执行并行相干检测。外部平衡光电检测和高速数字化仪记录每个已解调光谱切片的同相和正交分量，并且数字信号处理可重建信号波形。该方法是无源的，可以扩展到光谱的其他区域，并且可以实现为单个硅光子集成电路。
